quote: I always call the listing agent before submitting an offer... it shouldn't, but it does make my offer stand out over others.
why_clipworthy: Highlights a specific tactic that can improve offer acceptance rates.
suggested_hook: Want your offers to stand out? Here's a simple tactic that works.

quote: If you cannot hire a TC now, there is very little chance of you being able to scale.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the mindset that transaction coordinators are only for high producers.
suggested_hook: Think you can't afford a transaction coordinator? Think again.
